children.text: This door has a step down to the ground greater than 230mm.
Part 3.9.1.6 Thresholds of the Building Code of Australia (BCA) states that
‘Where the threshold of a doorway is more than 230mm above the adjoining surface it must incorporate steps having riser and going dimensions in accordance with 3.9.1.2” .
The height of this threshold must be made to comply with this requirement of the Building Code of Australia (BCA).
